column4: whyme didn't work for me when I tried it once.. unfortunately
Xournal is interesting.. glad you suggested it.. pdfedit is a bit difficult to annotate with.

Zyklon has a remote server (friends and commercial) with ubuntu server running .. he's using putty from win7 to ssh into it and sudo doesn't work because ssh server on the server isn't setup right to allow that.
I guess! so issue a ticket to them.
